import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './singlePost.css' import { useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation() const path = location.pathname.split('/')[2] useEffect(() =>{ const getPost = async () =>{ const res = axios.get('/posts'+path) } },[path]) return (
